sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Maneuver) Once per round, when wielding a light- saber, the character can make a Center of Being maneuver. Until the beginning of his next turn, whenever an enemy makes a melee attack targeting the character, the critical rating of the enemy's weapon counts as one higher per rank of Center of Being.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Center of being</name> <number>TAL0001013</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 16:34:39</sys_created_on> <sys_id>3b430e60db660c542901de90cf9619a5</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 16:34:39</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
